translation.en: [Nami] Easy. Easy!
Easy. Easy. Don't drop him.
I didn't. He's really heavy.
I mean, he's got a really big head. It's, like, freakishly big.
translation.ko: 솔직히 조로 머리가 좀 크냐? 놀랄 정도로 크잖아

translation.en: [Nami] What does that have to do with anything?
-Zoro? Hey, can you hear me? -[Usopp] Where's the first aid kit?
translation.ko: 조로, 내 말 들려? 구급상자 어딨어?

translation.en: -[Nami] Do we have a first aid kit? -Zoro?
[Usopp] These are all I could find. Where's he bleeding from?
translation.ko: 배에 있는 건 이게 다야 출혈 부위가 어디야?

translation.en: [Nami] Everywhere.
-[Usopp] We need more towels. -[Nami] We need a doctor.
[Usopp] Last I checked, we don't have one.
[Nami] Luffy? Luffy!
Someone needs to go back to Baratie.
Um, I'm really not hungry right now, Nami. [Nami] Not for food.
translation.ko: - 나 지금 배 안 고파, 나미 - 그게 아니라!

translation.en: Maybe one of the customers is a ship's doctor.
translation.ko: 식당 손님 중에 선의가 있을지도 모르잖아

translation.en: Right. A doctor.
We need a doctor.
-[Zeff] What do you think you're doing? -Chopping carrots, chef.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거냐? - 당근 썰잖아요, 주방장님

translation.en: Yeah, I can see that. But why are you doing it in my kitchen? I demoted you, remember?
translation.ko: 내 주방에 왜 왔냐고 물었어 요리 금지라고 했을 텐데

translation.en: That you did. But Patty's sleeping off a brutal hangover,
translation.ko: 그렇긴 한데 패티가 숙취 때문에 눈을 못 뜨길래

translation.en: so unless you want to do brunch prep all by yourself…
translation.ko: 혼자서 브런치 준비하실까 봐 도와주러 왔죠

translation.en: Fine.
Them carrots are cut too thick.
And those eggs are way too runny.
And I can tell just by looking at that, that rémoulade needs a lot more oregano.
translation.ko: 그 르물라드소스는 딱 봐도 오레가노가 부족해 보이네

translation.en: Oregano is for savages.
[Luffy] Help! Help!
Help! Help! Zoro… Zoro needs a doctor.
He got into a fight with this warlord guy, but he lost.
-And now he's bleeding from everywhere-- -Whoa. Whoa. Slow down, Chore Boy.
-I can't understand a word you're saying. -My friend is dying.
translation.ko: 하나도 못 알아듣겠다 내 친구가 죽어가

translation.en: Nearest doctor's on the Conomi Islands. It's a two-day sail from here.
translation.ko: 의사를 찾으려면 이틀 거리인 코노미 제도에 가야 하지

translation.en: That's too long.
I can't help you. Hope your friend makes it.
Where do you think you're going?
-To help Chore Boy's friend. -Brunch is not gonna prep itself.
translation.ko: - 잡일꾼의 친구를 도우러요 - 브런치 준비는 어쩌고?

translation.en: You always told me to feed anyone who's hungry. I don't see how this is any different.
translation.ko: 굶주린 사람은 꼭 먹이라면서요 도움이 필요하면 도와줘야죠

translation.en: Fine.
Bring me my kitchen knives and a bottle of our best whiskey.
translation.ko: 내 식칼이랑 고급 위스키 한 병 챙겨라

translation.en: And a fresh yellowtail from the cooler. Bigger the better.
translation.ko: 냉장고에서 싱싱한 방어 한 마리도 꺼내 - 클수록 좋아 - 방어요?

translation.en: A yellowtail?
Just do it already.
Are you kidding? He needs a doctor.
Do you wanna save your swordsman friend or not?
-Is that to sterilize the wounds? -[Zeff] Hell, no.
That'd be a waste of really good liquor.
translation.ko: 이 좋은 술을 왜 상처에 부어?

translation.en: Beautiful.
Needle.
Fish skin.
This is an old seaman's trick.
The fish skin helps staunch the wounds and heals the flesh a lot faster.
translation.ko: 생선 껍질은 지혈을 돕고 상처를 빨리 아물게 하지

translation.en: Is he gonna be okay?
Look, I'm not gonna lie to you. He's lost a lot of blood.
-It might be too late for him. -But it might not be.
translation.ko: - 이미 글렀을지도 몰라 - 그건 모르는 거지

translation.en: He's got one foot in each world right now, caught between life and death.
translation.ko: 두 세계의 경계에 갇혔을 거다 이승과 저승의 경계에

translation.en: You have to find a way to keep him tethered to our world.
translation.ko: 친구를 이승에 붙잡아 두려면 너희가 방법을 찾아야 해

translation.en: Talk to him. Tell him stories. Sing him sea shanties for all I care.
translation.ko: 말을 걸고 이야기를 들려줘라 뱃노래라도 불러주든가

translation.en: He may not reply,
but at least he'll know his crew are still with him.
Mihawk.
Nice of you to announce yourself.
I thought this was a conversation we might have privately.
Dismissed, cadet.
Aye, sir.
[Garp] So where is he?
Where's Luffy?
-At the moment, I don't know. -What do you mean, you don't know?
translation.ko: 지금은 어딨는지 모르겠네요 그게 무슨 소리지?

translation.en: I decided to let him go.
I specifically told you to bring him to me.
translation.ko: 그놈을 내게 데려오라고 분명히 명령했을 텐데

translation.en: Come now, Vice-Admiral. I don't take orders.
translation.ko: 왜 이러시나 난 명령 같은 거 안 듣잖아요

translation.en: Not even from the likes of you.
As one of the Seven Warlords,
you serve at the pleasure of the World Government.
translation.ko: 세계정부의 뜻에 따라 움직일 의무가 있고

translation.en: -Without our immunity-- -I would still do precisely what I want.
translation.ko: 그 대가로 면책권을… 난 내가 원하는 것만 합니다

translation.en: No more and no less.
And what I want
is to see what becomes of that young man when he enters the Grand Line.
translation.ko: 그랜드 라인에 입성한 그 소년의 모습을 지켜보는 거죠

translation.en: I won't let that happen.
Then you have your work cut out for you, Vice-Admiral,
because that boy is interesting.
Who knows?
Maybe your grandson will be the one to find the One Piece after all.
translation.ko: 당신의 손자가 원피스를 찾는 주인공이 될지

translation.en: I'll take my dinner in the mess hall tonight.
[Usopp] Mmm. Something smells delicious.
I just thought everyone'd be hungry, man. Plenty we didn't use.
translation.ko: 배고플 것 같아서 준비했어 생선도 많이 남았고

translation.en: -Never waste food. -[Usopp] Cool.
What's the matter? Don't like fish?
I love fish. I just need to get Zoro's sword ready for him.
translation.ko: 좋아해, 그냥 조로의 검을 닦아주고 있었어

translation.en: You know, for when he wakes up.
He's, uh,
pretty badly hurt, man.
There's an itty-bitty chance he might not wake up.
Zoro's the strongest fighter that I know.
translation.ko: 내가 아는 사람 중에 가장 강한 녀석이야

translation.en: No way he's gonna let some warlord guy beat him.
translation.ko: 웬 칠무해 녀석 때문에 쓰러질 일은 없어

translation.en: Well, you've gotta eat.
Come on. If you don't want the fish, I got two-inch T-bones in the kitchen.
Or, uh, maybe you're in the mood for saffron risotto?
I normally would get both,
but I really gotta get the Waddy Itchy Monkey ready for him.
-The what? -His sword.
It's got a name.
-Why? -[Luffy] I don't know.
He said it was kind of special.
Hey, Sanji, can you cook Zoro's favorite food?
translation.ko: 상디, 조로가 제일 좋아하는 음식도 만들 수 있어?

translation.en: Sure. What does he like?
-He really likes rice balls. -Mm-hmm.
[Luffy] And beer.
What about rice balls soaked in beer? -Can you make that? -[Sanji laughs]
translation.ko: 주먹밥을 맥주에 적셔서 줄까? 그것도 가능해?

translation.en: I can make anything. Just tell me what you want.
I want him to eat
so that he gets back his strength.
But I also want him to sleep so that his wounds can heal.
translation.ko: 근데 잠에서 깨면 안 돼 그래야 상처를 회복하지

translation.en: Or maybe… maybe he just needs some water. Right?
After all of that fighting, he must be awfully thirsty. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 열심히 싸웠으니까 아마 목이 타들어 갈 거야

translation.en: But, you know, he's probably also tired, so…
so yeah, we should just let him rest.
Being a captain, it's the toughest job in the world, okay?
translation.ko: 선장이 되는 건 세상에서 가장 힘든 일이야

translation.en: Zeff once told me
that making decisions is what separates a captain from the rest of his crew.
translation.ko: 제프가 그랬어 선장은 선원들과 달리 결정을 내려야 하는 역할이래

translation.en: And he was one of the best pirate captains that ever sailed the seas.
translation.ko: 역대 최고의 해적 선장이 한 말이니 믿을 만하지

translation.en: Zeff was a pirate?
Yeah. Captain of the dreaded Cook Pirates. They used to call him "Red Leg Zeff,"
translation.ko: 그래, 쿡 해적단의 선장이었어 붉은 다리 제프로 유명했지

translation.en: 'cause his boots were always stained with the blood of his enemies.
translation.ko: 신발이 적들의 피로 항상 붉게 물들어 있었거든

translation.en: How'd you two meet? Were you on his crew or something?
translation.ko: 둘은 어떻게 만났어? 혹시 네가 제프의 부하였나?

translation.en: Not exactly.
Sanji, get a move on. Those tables ain't gonna bus themselves.
translation.ko: 상디, 빨리 나가라 네가 가서 테이블을 치워야지

translation.en: I'm working on my velouté. Gotta get the texture just right.
translation.ko: 블루테소스 만드는 중이에요 질감이 완벽해야 하거든요

translation.en: Velou… what? This is a ship's galley.
translation.ko: 뭘 만들어? 여긴 선박 조리실이야 그런 고급 요리는 만들 필요 없어

translation.en: You're never gonna serve fancy stuff like that.
translation.ko: 여긴 선박 조리실이야 그런 고급 요리는 만들 필요 없어

translation.en: I will when I get to the All Blue.
Hear that, boys? Sanji's going to the All Blue!
translation.ko: 다들 들었어? 상디가 올 블루에 가겠대

translation.en: It's not a real place, kid. The All Blue doesn't exist.
Yes, it does. And one day, I'm gonna find it.
It's a tall tale told by cooks to pass the time. Now get to those tables.
translation.ko: 요리사들이 심심해서 지어낸 이야기일 뿐이지 빨리 테이블 안 치워?

translation.en: [man] Pirates! We're getting boarded!
Pirates? We've gotta get out of here!
[Zeff] Mmm, velouté.
[Zeff] No, no, no, no.
Needs oregano.
Oregano's for savages!
Nice try, little eggplant. Now, how do you wanna die? Quick or slow?
translation.ko: 겁대가리 없는 애송이군! 말해봐라, 어떻게 죽여줄까?

translation.en: Who cares? I'd rather die than have you season my food.
translation.ko: 알 게 뭐야? 내 요리를 더럽혔으니 차라리 죽는 게 나아

translation.en: You made that?
That's not half bad.
Better than anything you can make, you old shitbag!
translation.ko: 네가 만든 것보단 맛있겠지 망할 노친네야!

translation.en: You've got a sharp tongue on you, boy.
How about I cut it out and fry it up with some pig fat?
Do what you want, but I'm not gonna die here.
translation.ko: 맘대로 해 하지만 여기서 죽을 순 없어

translation.en: Not until I find the All Blue.
The All Blue?
So you tell me, what does little eggplant know about the All Blue?
translation.ko: 말해봐라 너 같은 애송이가 올 블루에 대해 뭘 안다는 거지?

translation.en: What happened?
A storm.
Sunk both our ships.
But… but the crew…
They're all dead,
except for us.
What do we do?
We wait.
And we hope that a passing ship spots us before that sun…
translation.ko: 그리고 배가 지나가길 빌어야지 저 햇볕에…

translation.en: bleaches our bones.
Now,
this is all the food we got.
So eat slow. There's no more after this.
translation.ko: 아껴 먹어 다 먹고 나면 굶어야 돼

translation.en: Why do you get the bigger one? 'Cause I'm three times your size. That's why!
translation.ko: - 왜 아저씨 자루가 더 커? - 내가 너보다 세 배는 크니까!

translation.en: You know something? You should be glad that I'm giving you anything at all.
translation.ko: 챙겨 주는 것만으로 고마운 줄 알아야지

translation.en: Now go over to the other side and keep a lookout.
translation.ko: 이제 반대편에 가서 배가 오는지 봐라

translation.en: And I mean it. Don't you bother me unless you see a ship.
translation.ko: 그리고 절대로 배가 나타나기 전까지 날 방해할 생각은 마

translation.en: You got it?
I said, you got it?
Now go!
Ship!
Ship! Hey!
Hey, ship, over here!
Come on!
Ship!
Please! Please!
Come on, ship!
No. No! No.
The old man had twice as much food.
If he won't give me any,
I'll kill him myself.
I thought I told you to stay put.
You still have some food. You gotta give me some!
translation.ko: 아저씬 먹을 게 남았잖아 나도 나눠 줘!

translation.en: Where is it?!
Where is it?
There's no food! How are you still alive?!
translation.ko: 식량이 없는데 뭘 먹고 버틴 거야?

translation.en: Your leg. What happened?
You ate it?
You ate your own leg?
You gave me all the food. Why?
translation.ko: 먹을 걸 다 나한테 줬어? 왜?

translation.en: You don't even know me. Why would you do that for a stranger?
translation.ko: 날 알지도 못하잖아 왜 남을 위해 그렇게까지 해?

translation.en: Because, little eggplant…
I have been searching for the All Blue…
my whole life.
But now my time has come to an end.
You share the same dream as me.
translation.ko: 넌 나와 같은 꿈을 꾸고 있어

translation.en: Believe me,
the All Blue
is real.
It's real.
And if I can't find it…
well, then maybe you can.
So I'm gonna need you to live on.
And I'm gonna need you to fulfil that dream…
for both of us.
[Sanji] Have any idea what that's like?
Having someone lose a limb to save your life?
translation.ko: 누가 나를 살리겠다고 다리를 자른다는 게?

translation.en: Actually, I kind of do.
[Sanji] Look, all I'm saying is, we were out there for 85 days.
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 얘기는 우리가 표류됐던 85일 동안

translation.en: He could've let me die on that rock.
translation.ko: 제프는 내가 죽게 내버려 둘 수도 있었지만

translation.en: Instead, he acted like a captain.
He made the tough call.
I'd eat both arms and legs to save Zoro's life.
translation.ko: 조로를 살릴 수만 있다면 난 팔다리 다 먹을 수 있어

translation.en: [Nami] "In a certain country, in the northern seas,
there was an explorer named Mont Blanc Noland."
"His stories were always grand adventures that sounded like lies."
translation.ko: '노랜드의 놀라운 모험 이야기는 언제나 거짓말 같았죠'

translation.en: "Noland told his king he found a city of gold,
but when the king went to claim the treasure,
the city was gone,
and most of the king's soldiers perished on the journey."
translation.ko: '험한 여정 속에서 병사들은 대부분 목숨을 잃고 말았습니다'

translation.en: "Noland was sentenced to death, but he continued to lie to his king,
translation.ko: '노랜드에게 사형이 내려졌지만 그는 거짓말을 멈추지 않았고'

translation.en: insisting the city of gold sank into the sea."
"And…
even though nobody believed him,
he never stopped lying until he was dead."
[Luffy] Poor guy.
Can you imagine that? Losing a whole city of gold?
I don't think that was the point of the story.
translation.ko: 이야기의 주제가 그게 아닌 것 같은데

translation.en: Stories can have different points.
I mean…
why did the king have to kill him?
Sometimes, when you are in charge, you have to make the tough decisions.
translation.ko: 지도자는 때론 힘든 결정을 내려야 하는 법이야

translation.en: Why does everybody keep saying that?
translation.ko: 왜 다들 그 말을 하는 거야?

translation.en: Because you could've saved Zoro.
He didn't have to fight Mihawk, but you let it happen.
translation.ko: 미호크랑 싸우지 않아도 됐는데 네가 놔뒀잖아

translation.en: Why didn't you stop him?
I didn't think he was going to lose.
-You could've tried to change his mind. -I would never do that.
translation.ko: - 조로를 설득할 수 있었잖아 - 그렇게는 못 해

translation.en: So you'd rather see him like this?
He might die, Luffy.
And I'd do anything to save him.
Anything.
Except stand in the way of his dream.
translation.ko: 하지만 꿈을 막는 건 못 해

translation.en: -We all have dreams, but we outgrow them. -[Luffy] Is that really what you think?
translation.ko: 꿈은 누구에게나 있어 철들면 사라질 뿐이지 정말 그렇게 생각해?

translation.en: Don't you have a dream?
Yeah. Right now, it's for Zoro to not die in my bed.
translation.ko: 그래, 지금 내 꿈은 조로가 죽지 않는 거야

translation.en: But isn't there something that you want?
Something more.
More than anything else in this world.
Not everyone gets to follow their dreams.
translation.ko: 모두가 꿈만 좇으며 살 순 없어

translation.en: [Garp] Cadet.
-I'm sorry about all this. -I'm sure you had your reason.
And you already know the reason, don't you?
-I didn't hear-- -You know Luffy is my grandson.
translation.ko: - 무슨 말씀인지… - 루피가 내 손자라는 걸 알잖아

translation.en: I spent years trying to train him.
Trying to build him into a proper Marine.
He resisted me every step of the way.
Wouldn't listen. Wouldn't learn. Wouldn't cooperate.
You're an exemplary cadet. The two of you couldn't be more different.
translation.ko: 자네는 모범적인 해병이야 루피와는 너무나도 달라

translation.en: Sir.
Sir.
I spent time with Luffy.
-I know how his mind works. -So do I. What's your point?
translation.ko: - 어떤 사람인지 깨달았어요 - 내가 내 손자를 모른다는 건가?

translation.en: Luffy is different.
He doesn't follow the rules.
He thinks for himself, no matter what anyone else says.
translation.ko: 누가 뭐라고 하든 자기 생각대로 하죠

translation.en: That's my fault. I was too easy on him.
Sir, it wouldn't have mattered,
because Luffy knows exactly what he is.
translation.ko: 루피는 자신의 본분이 뭔지 정확히 아니까요

translation.en: And what's that?
A pirate.
Luffy's always been a pirate. And he always will be a pirate.
translation.ko: 언제나 그래왔고 앞으로도 영원히 해적일 거예요

translation.en: No matter how many assassins you send after him, he'll never change.
translation.ko: 아무리 사람을 보내 괴롭혀도 루피는 변하지 않아요

translation.en: He'd rather die first.
Then what do you suggest?
-That I let him be a damn fool pirate? -Would that be the worst thing, sir?
translation.ko: 망할 해적이 되는 꼴을 보고만 있어? 그게 그렇게 나쁜가요?

translation.en: Maybe you're right.
Maybe I've been going about this the wrong way all along.
translation.ko: 그동안 내 방식이 완전히 틀렸을 수도 있겠군

translation.en: Muster the Marines on deck. I'll address them at afternoon watch.
translation.ko: 선원들을 갑판에 집합시키게 오후 견시 시간에 통보하지

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Who's hungry? [snarls]
[host] Welcome to Baratie.
How can I serve you?
Serve?
Interesting choice of words.
You have food here, don't you? We wanna eat.
[host] I'm afraid there are no more tables--
I see a bunch of tables.
Sit down!
No one leaves.
Except you.
Let's all enjoy our last meal,
together.
Who are you, old man?
My name is Zeff.
And I own this place.
Well, I'm Arlong.
And I own the East Blue.
No one owns the sea.
Not even a fishman.
Well, that's about to change, once you give me what I want.
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 걸 당신이 넘겨주면 내가 주인이 될 텐데?

translation.en: [Arlong] Listen up. I'm looking for a pirate in a straw hat.
translation.ko: 잘 들어 밀짚모자 쓴 해적을 찾고 있다

translation.en: Goes by the name of Luffy.
He has something that belongs to me.
Straw hat, you say, hmm?
No.
That's not familiar.
But why don't I fix you a meal?
Absolutely anything you want off of that menu, no charge.
translation.ko: 메뉴에서 뭐든 골라도 좋으니 공짜로 먹고 가

translation.en: Well, I already have a meal.
But if you don't bring me the straw-hat boy before I finish,
translation.ko: 내가 이걸 다 먹기 전에 밀짚모자 녀석을 넘기지 않으면

translation.en: maybe I might just start adding some of these nice folks to the menu.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 선량한 손님들을 먹고 싶어질지도 모르겠군

translation.en: How's he doing?
He hasn't said a word.
Didn't Zeff say we're supposed to talk to him? Tell him stories?
translation.ko: 제프가 계속 말 걸라고 했잖아 이야기도 해주고

translation.en: What would I say?
[Usopp] Whatever pops in your head.
Just… speak from the gut.
My gut hasn't been so great lately.
Well…
at least he'll know it's you.
What do you got to lose?
Hey, Zoro.
What's up?
I just wanted to tell you that…
Let me start over.
I'm just gonna…
Hi, Zoro. Hi.
-You know, it's-- -[Nami] Luffy!
Luffy!
The Arlong Pirates are at Baratie. We have to leave now.
translation.ko: 아론 일당이 바라티에에 왔어 당장 떠나야 돼

translation.en: -What? Why? Why should we leave? -Because they're looking for you.
translation.ko: 뭐? 우리가 왜 떠나야 되는데? 널 찾으러 온 거니까

translation.en: -Me? -[Nami] And the map.
Those fishmen will tear this place apart if Zeff doesn't turn him over.
translation.ko: 제프가 너를 넘기지 않으면 식당을 없애버릴지도 몰라

translation.en: Where are you going? If Baratie's in danger, I need to be there.
translation.ko: - 넌 어디 가? - 식당이 위험한데 가봐야지

translation.en: -I'm coming with you. -[Nami] Did you not hear what I just said?
translation.ko: - 같이 가자 - 내 말 못 들었니?

translation.en: They are hunting you. We need to run.
I'm with Nami on this one. I'm really not trying to ruffle any feathers or scales--
translation.ko: 난 나미 말에 동의해 잠자는 어인의 비늘을 건드리긴 싫은데…

translation.en: I'm not running. We're going to protect this place.
translation.ko: 난 도망 안 가 바라티에를 지킬 거야

translation.en: This isn't your fight. Why would you do that?
You fed us.
Look, I know this crew. Their captain, Arlong,
translation.ko: 얘들아, 내가 저놈들을 아는데 선장인 아론은

translation.en: has the highest bounty in all of the East Blue.
translation.ko: 이스트 블루에서 가장 높은 현상금이 걸려 있어

translation.en: -You do not want to mess with him. -It sounds like he messed with us first.
translation.ko: 건드리지 않는 게 좋아 걔가 먼저 우릴 건드렸는데?

translation.en: Luffy, please.
Please.
I can't let innocent people get hurt because of me.
translation.ko: 나 때문에 무고한 사람들이 다치게 둘 순 없어

translation.en: If those fishmen guys want a fight,
we're gonna give them one.
You stay with the ship and protect the map.
It's gonna be safe with you.
What's the matter?
You never seen a fishman enjoy a meal?
That's because you don't know any fishmen,
except for the ones who repair your ship or clean your house.
translation.ko: 네 배를 고쳐주고 집 치워주는 어인들 말고는

translation.en: I have nothing against your kind. That's a shame,
'cause I have everything against yours.
-Puny, petulant humans! -[guests clamor]
You see,
most fishmen would be happy to sit at the same table as a human.
translation.ko: 어인 대부분은 인간과 같은 곳에서 먹을 수만 있어도 행복할 거야

translation.en: They want to be treated as equals.
But you dare stoop so low.
We all know there's nothing equal about us.
translation.ko: 다들 알지 않나? 어인과 인간은 전혀 다르다는 거?

translation.en: Fishmen are superior to humans in every single way.
translation.ko: 어인은 모든 면에서 인간보다 월등한 존재지

translation.en: Stronger, faster,
hungrier.
Wouldn't you agree?
Which one of you is Arlong?
Who is asking?
I'm Monkey D. Luffy.
-I hear you're looking for me. -Why, yes, I am.
So this is the pirate I've heard so much about?
translation.ko: 내 귀를 따갑게 했던 소문의 주인공이

translation.en: You know, I was expecting someone… bigger.
So was I.
Do you know who I am, boy?
I'm Arlong the Saw.
Even the Marines flee before my flag.
translation.ko: 해군도 내 깃발을 보면 줄행랑을 치지

translation.en: Not ringing a bell. How'd you find me anyway?
translation.ko: 처음 들어 근데 난 어떻게 찾았어?

translation.en: An old friend helped me track you down. [clicks tongue]
Heya, Straw Hat. Did you miss me?
translation.ko: 안녕, 밀짚모자! 나 안 보고 싶었어?

translation.en: Burpy?
What are you doing here?
Believe me, it wasn't my first choice either.
But these fine fishy folk persuaded me to point them in the right direction,
translation.ko: 근데 이 잘생긴 물고기 친구들이 네가 어느 쪽으로 갔는지 가리키라는 거야

translation.en: which ain't easy when you don't have any hands. [chuckles]
-How'd you even know how to find me? -I told you.
translation.ko: - 여기 있는 건 어떻게 알았고? - 말했잖아

translation.en: I've got eyes and ears everywhere.
Stereo!
You were listening all along?
-You heard everything? -Everything.
And that got old quick,
'cause you shidiots have no idea what you're doing.
translation.ko: 바보 멍청이들이 아는 게 하나도 없더라니까

translation.en: Hey, Lips,
how about a scratch behind the old ear, huh?
translation.ko: 귀 뒤쪽 좀 긁어줄 수 있나?

translation.en: Sorry, honey.
Oh, come on! Give a clown a break. I--
Oh, wait! No! Not back in the bag. It's so dark and wet and sandy. [wails]
translation.ko: 안 돼, 자루는 안 돼! 깜깜하고 축축한 모래밭이라고! 제발!

translation.en: [Arlong] Listen here.
I want my map,
along with half of whatever you plunder as tribute.
translation.ko: 앞으로 얻는 노획물의 절반을 공물로 바쳐라

translation.en: And if you bow down to me, I might even let you serve in my kingdom.
translation.ko: 내게 무릎을 꿇는다면 내 왕국에서 나를 모실 수 있게 해주지

translation.en: I don't bow down to any man.
translation.ko: 난 다른 사람에게 무릎 꿇지 않아

translation.en: I'm no man.
-Or fish. -[growls]
And you're no king.
translation.ko: - 그리고 넌 왕이 아니야 - 곧 될 거야

translation.en: I will be when I get my Grand Line map.
translation.ko: - 그리고 넌 왕이 아니야 - 곧 될 거야 그랜드 라인 지도만 손에 넣으면

translation.en: Then…
you're gonna have to fight me for it.
Then let the fighting begin.
Zeff!
Really great fighter.
Gum Gum
Pistol!
Get up!
Not bad for a human.
-Uh? -Oh, big mistake.
Now I'm gonna have to make an example out of you.
I told you in the bar I didn't have any friends, but
the truth is, I couldn't let myself have them…
translation.ko: 사실은 일부러 친구를 만들지 않았던 거야

translation.en: because I always end up hurting the people closest to me.
translation.ko: 난 항상 소중한 사람들을 다치게 하거든

translation.en: I don't know what's so special about you, boy.
translation.ko: 네깟 소년이 뭐가 대단하다는 건지 모르겠군

translation.en: Why don't you come find out?
Come on, fish guy.
Is that all you got?
How about a drink?
[Nami] Arlong, wait!
I have it.
I have the map.
I got it for you, just like I said I would.
Nami?
-What are you doing? -I tried to tell you, Luffy.
I was never on your crew.
I only joined up with you so I could steal the map.
I don't believe that.
That's because you only believe what you want to believe. Doesn't make it true.
translation.ko: 넌 원래 믿고 싶은 것만 믿지 그렇다고 그게 사실이 되진 않아

translation.en: Sister Nami's a loyal member of the Arlong Pirates.
She has been for years.
We have the map, Arlong.
Let's go.
Not until I finish my meal.
Why waste your time killing a Devil Fruit eater?
translation.ko: 악마의 열매 능력자 죽이겠다고 왜 시간을 낭비하실까?

translation.en: Let the sea do it for you.
Where's Nami?
[Usopp] She's gone.
She's a member of Arlong's crew.
No.
She can't be.
Attention!
At ease.
Marines,
you've done an outstanding job pursuing these pirates we've been chasing.
translation.ko: 그동안 나와 함께 해적들을 쫓느라 고생이 많았다

translation.en: I'm proud of your efforts to apprehend these miscreants.
But I've underestimated their resolve,
their determination to flaunt their illegal activities.
translation.ko: 불법 행위를 당당히 일삼는 해적들의 의지를

translation.en: They are becoming more than a nuisance
and must be treated as such.
So our mission has changed.
No more half measures.
No more soft targets.
The Straw Hats and their captain will never surrender.
translation.ko: 밀짚모자 일당은 절대 투항할 녀석들이 아니다

translation.en: So the gloves are coming off!
We will capture them.
And they will be brought to justice!
I don't need you to do that.
We've got a full house tomorrow. Two dinner seatings, plus brunch.
translation.ko: 내일 디너 두 타임에 브런치 예약까지 꽉 찼어요

translation.en: Enough! I don't wanna hear this.
-What is your problem? -[Zeff] Me?
I'm fine. You're the one with the problem.
translation.ko: 난 아무렇지 않아 문제는 너한테 있지

translation.en: I'm just helping you clean up.
Yeah, but no one asked you to, did they? So get out of my restaurant now.
translation.ko: 난 도와달라 한 적 없어 당장 내 식당에서 나가

translation.en: I told you I'm not gonna be a waiter.
You're not gonna be anything, not if you stay here.
translation.ko: 여기 있으면 넌 아무것도 못 돼

translation.en: I did not save your life so you could waste it at Baratie.
translation.ko: 바라티에에서 인생 허비하라고 살려준 게 아니다

translation.en: It's not like I can just leave.
Why the hell not? Because you couldn't run this place without me.
translation.ko: - 왜 못 떠나? - 나 없이 여기가 돌아가겠어요?

translation.en: Oh, please, little eggplant, your cooking is for shit.
translation.ko: 너처럼 요리에 젬병인 애송이는 없는 게 나아!

translation.en: At least I don't drown everything in oregano.
Yeah, at least I'm not the one who goes on moaning about the All Blue.
translation.ko: 난 누구처럼 올 블루가 어쩌고저쩌고 타령하진 않지

translation.en: You've been yammering on about that since you was a snotty-nosed little brat.
translation.ko: 건방진 코흘리개일 때부터 올 블루, 올 블루 노래를 부르더만

translation.en: Well, I'll tell you now. If it means that much to you, go find it.
translation.ko: 그래서 얘기하잖냐 너한테 그토록 중요한 거라면 이제 찾으러 가라고

translation.en: Look, do you want me to quit? Is that what you want?
Quitting is staying here!
Don't you get it?
It's one thing to have a dream. It's another to go after it.
translation.ko: 꿈은 꾼다고 이루어지지 않아 좇아야 이루어지는 거야

translation.en: Chore Boy offered me a spot on his crew. Maybe I'll take him up on that offer.
translation.ko: 잡일꾼이 같이 가자고 했으니까 그 배에 타면 되겠네요

translation.en: You want my permission? You got it.
-Fine! -Fine!
Fine!
Hey, Zoro.
You sure missed a big fight.
Those fishmen guys were tough.
You would've loved it.
And we had a pretty great dinner.
All of us sitting around together,
listening to Usopp's stories.
Only I kind of messed it up.
And now I lost Nami.
I lost the Grand Line map.
And maybe I will lose you too.
I didn't know what to say before,
but I know what to say now, and it's so simple.
translation.ko: 이제는 할 말이 생겼어 아주 간단한 말이야

translation.en: I need you, Zoro.
I need you
to wake up.
[Zoro] You gonna keep talking, or let me get some sleep?
translation.ko: 계속 떠들어 대서 잠을 못 자겠네

translation.en: Zoro?
Zoro! [laughs]
Zoro, you're not dead!
[straining] Right now, I'm wishing I was.
I had the strangest dream
that Nami left.
[Luffy] She did.
It's my fault.
No, you didn't do anything wrong.
You acted like a captain.
But our crew is falling apart.
No, it's not.
I, Roronoa Zoro…
vow to stand by your side
from now until the end.
Until we find the One Piece
or die trying.
So bring on the Marines or pirates or sea beasts.
translation.ko: 그러니까 해군, 해적, 바다 괴물 다 덤비라고 해

translation.en: You're my captain, Luffy,
and I'm your first mate.
[Usopp] Zoro!
Zoro! [gasps]
I wasn't worried for a second.
He's alive!
And I told 'em. I said, "You'd better not mess with the Straw Hats!"
translation.ko: 내가 놈들한테 그랬어 - '밀짚모자 일당한테 까불지 마!' - 그래!

translation.en: Sent 'em swimming for their lives.
-You scared 'em off, huh? -[Usopp] Mm-hmm.
-The Great Captain Usopp. -[Usopp] Yeah.
So what do we do now? Plot a course for the Grand Line?
translation.ko: 이제 어떡할까? 그랜드 라인으로 항로 설정해?

translation.en: Nope.
But I thought we were going after the One Piece?
We are.
But we can't do it without our whole crew.
translation.ko: 하지만 동료를 두고 갈 순 없지

translation.en: First…
we're going after Nami.
Lot of dried meat in these barrels.
-You think we brought too much? -You know who you're sailing with?
translation.ko: 너무 많이 챙겼나? 쟤 얼마나 먹는지 몰라?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mmm.
[Sanji] Heard you guys need a cook.
Yeah! Yes, we do! [chuckles]
Welcome aboard.
-Why are we bringing the waiter? -Because we can't boil water.
translation.ko: 웨이터가 왜 필요해? 우린 물도 못 끓이니까

translation.en: Dropping the sail!
[man] Casting off.
[Zeff] Hey, Sanji!
You keep your feet dry.
Goodbye, Zeff.
You know, all these years,
living under your shitty roof, cooking at your shitty restaurant…
translation.ko: 이 허접한 레스토랑에서 같이 지내면서 내가 얼마나…

translation.en: I owe you my life!
Thank you for putting up with my shit all these years, old man.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 빌어먹게 신세 많이 졌습니다, 영감님

translation.en: I'll never forget you, Zeff!
So we're… we're going after Nami, but how are we gonna find her?
translation.ko: 나미한테 가는 건 좋은데 어떻게 찾을 생각이야?

translation.en: Yeah, we don't even know where she is.
I know someone who does.
Hello, boys!
